name: Calling Birds
description:
You are a bird on a telephone pole. Can you cross to the other side?

Made for GGJ 2018. The theme was Transmission.

*

Things we'd change:

  • Build: Make everything prefabs sooner
  • Build: Figure out sorting layers so that text is more readable
  • Gameplay: More audio (for telephone poles and crossed wires)
  • Gameplay: A better ending!

Games we thought about while making this game (you should go and play these!):

  • Sacramento
  • Beach Walker
